lead_paragraph: Home prices are up after years of steady declines, but the rebound is sluggish, because of an oversupply of inventory and Spain’s depressed economy.
snippet: Home prices are up after years of steady declines, but the rebound is sluggish, because of an oversupply of inventory and Spain’s depressed economy.
abstract: International House Hunting column; eight-bedroom apartment within walking distance from Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao, Spain, Basque region's economic capital, is listed at $1.62 million; information about market and tips for buying properties in Spain highlighted.
